trans-unit.source: Get Started with Mobile Services for Xamarin Android apps | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Get Started with Mobile Services for Xamarin Android apps | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Azure Mobile Services and Notification Hubs to send push notifications to your Xamarin Android app
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Azure Mobile Services and Notification Hubs to send push notifications to your Xamarin Android app

trans-unit.source: Add push notifications to your Mobile Services app
trans-unit.target: Add push notifications to your Mobile Services app

trans-unit.source: This topic shows you how to use Azure Mobile Services to send push notifications to a Xamarin.Android app.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows you how to use Azure Mobile Services to send push notifications to a Xamarin.Android app.

trans-unit.source: In this tutorial you add push notifications using the Google Cloud Messaging (GCM) service to the [Get started with Mobile Services] project.
trans-unit.target: In this tutorial you add push notifications using the Google Cloud Messaging (GCM) service to the [Get started with Mobile Services] project.

trans-unit.source: When complete, your mobile service will send a push notification each time a record is inserted.
trans-unit.target: When complete, your mobile service will send a push notification each time a record is inserted.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial walks you through these basic steps to enable push notifications:
trans-unit.target: This tutorial walks you through these basic steps to enable push notifications:

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Enable Google Cloud Messaging</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Enable Google Cloud Messaging</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Configure Mobile Services</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Configure Mobile Services</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Configure the project for push notifications</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Configure the project for push notifications</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Add push notifications code to your app</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Add push notifications code to your app</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Insert data to receive notifications</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Insert data to receive notifications</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: This tutorial requires the following:
trans-unit.target: This tutorial requires the following:

trans-unit.source: An active Google account.
trans-unit.target: An active Google account.

trans-unit.source: [Google Cloud Messaging Client Component].
trans-unit.target: [Google Cloud Messaging Client Component].

trans-unit.source: You will add this component during the tutorial.
trans-unit.target: You will add this component during the tutorial.

trans-unit.source: You should already have the [Xamarin.Android] and <link><linkText>Azure Mobile Services[azure mobile services component]</linkText><title></title></link> components installed in your project from when you completed [Get started with Mobile Services].
trans-unit.target: You should already have the [Xamarin.Android] and <link><linkText>Azure Mobile Services[azure mobile services component]</linkText><title></title></link> components installed in your project from when you completed [Get started with Mobile Services].

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Enable Google Cloud Messaging
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Enable Google Cloud Messaging

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Configure your mobile service to send push requests
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Configure your mobile service to send push requests

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Update the mobile service to send push notifications
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Update the mobile service to send push notifications

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Configure the existing project for push notifications
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Configure the existing project for push notifications

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Add push notifications code to your app
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Add push notifications code to your app

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Test the app against the published mobile service
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Test the app against the published mobile service

trans-unit.source: You can test the app by directly attaching an Android phone with a USB cable, or by using a virtual device in the emulator.
trans-unit.target: You can test the app by directly attaching an Android phone with a USB cable, or by using a virtual device in the emulator.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html> Enable push notifications for local testing
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html> Enable push notifications for local testing
